casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Riley, Appellant, v. Russell, Warden, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel Riley v. Russell (1993), 66 Ohio St.3d 2.]

(No. 92-1890 Submitted January 5, 1993 Decided February 3, 1993.) Gerald L. Riley, pro se.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
